Package utility

Class GBC

java.lang.Object
java.awt.GridBagConstraints
utility.GBC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class GBC extends GridBagConstraints
This class simplifies the use of the GridBagConstraints class.
See Also:
Serialized Form
